Subject: Hidden One --- Discovered

From: "rAuq" <rauq@...>

--- Pacifix / Ikoto / JetV / Crotale ---

Pacifix frowns as he checks the scanners, the weird energy signal 
increasing in magnitude. "JetV, any idea?"

JetV looks over at Pacifix from across the control room, "'fraid not, 
Commander Pacifix. We should be ok, if we just plot a path around 
it. A safety precaution worth taking. We'll be ok." He says the last 
bit mostly to convince himself of that untruth.

At the same time,

Azafroth shimmers brightly, as the energy builds up, soon to be 
unleashed on the unsuspecting Autobots. He noticed that some 
other bots were following, and he thinks to himself, <<Those other 
bots will be of use as well. We will bend them to our will as 
well...>> 

He then sends a thought to the other Ikoto, "Fellow Ikoto. Prepare 
yourselves for the unveiling of the time-warp Maelstorm." He 
finishes connecting energy lines and a large spinning maelstorm of 
darkness appears off in front of the Autobots and the DED. 

The maelstorm is pure darkness, and isn't visible to optics. It is, 
however, visible to scanners. Immediately after the storm is 
created, it begins to pull the ships in to it's center. As the ships 
approach, they will begin to feel the effects of EMP weaponry 
(drained energy, weakness, computer failure), eventhough there are 
no EMP weapons.

Back on the Autobot ship,

Pacifix's eyes widden as he views the scanners with JetV. He 
checks the veiw port, then the scanners, then the view port, then 
the scanners again. 

"Uhh oh... JetV!" He says in a command like voice, inform the crew 
that something is happening, have them ready for an evac if neces--
" Pacifix starts to have trouble finishing his sentence. He feels 
weak but regains his strength, and struggles to go on, "--
necessary. Do it quick!" 

JetV leaves as fast as he can. He grabs a multi-room comm 
instrument, and yells into it, "HIDDEN ONE CREW, WE HAVE AN 
EMERGENCY, PREPARE FOR EVAC, MEET ME OUT IN THE 
STORAGE ROOM." His weakened arm drops the comm, leaving it 
hanging and he runs to the storage room.

Pacifix sits down into his chair, hears JetV's call but ignores it and 
starts to try to turn the ship around. "Damn it... somethings funny 
here..." He watches the scanners' energy level moniters start to top 
the scale, as they form a flickering image of what looks like a... 
black hole? He shakes his head, shrugging off an untimely bout of 
dizziness. He gets up, and starts heading back to the rest of the 
crew. He motions for Grimlock, and anyone else he sees to follow 
him.

Unknowing, in a blocked off, locked storage container, Crotale 
starts to feel weak. <<Whoa, what's happening here>> he 
wonders, <<Are we under attack?>> He starts to bang on his 
compartement door, trying to get out.

Away from the Autobots, the Ikoto shimmer in approval. Azafroth 
triumphantly sends a thought to the other Ikoto, "Yes! It is working, 
and soon we will begin the game, begin with additional players." 
His shimmering figure goes translucent, and his shimmer gains a 
reddish tint, to match his mood. He and the Ikoto watch in revel as 
their creation proceeds to slowly drag two ships from this world into 
the game death on the planet of pawns, Earth...
